comments.body: Oh look, someone who does not know the rules.The Lattice Labs account posted garbage walls of text that were arguably false and nobody cared.The Lattice Labs account posted with AI spam and would not stop doing it. This means the XRPNERD is evading a ban and is also not welcome here.-Dave
